SURVIVOR, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I AM GLAD I WENT THROUGH THIS TREATMENT WITH THIS MEDICATION. IT DID CURE ME OF HEPATITIS C . IT DID HOWEVER BRING TO MY ATTENTION THAT I HAD DEPRESSION / MOOD ISSUES AND IT WORSTENED THEM TO THE POINT THAT I SHOULD OF BEEN PLACED ON DISABILITY . I WAS NOT , AND IT MADE THE ENVIRONMENT FOR MYSELF , MY CO WORKERS , AND MOST IMPORTANT MY CHILDREN A NON SAFE, ANGRY , EMOTIONAL , AND CONFUSING DAILY EXPERIENCE ( FOR THE WHOLE YEAR AND TWO YEARS AFTERWARDS ) . I AM GREATFUL THAT I AM CURED , HOWEVER, I REGRET THAT MY CHILDREN HAD TO EXPERIENCE EMOTIONAL ABUSE DURING THAT PROCESS OF TREATMENT.

column9: I don't know how effective it is yet this time.  I haven't been back to the Dr since starting 3 weeks ago.  I know it is MUCH more merciful than it was in 1998 my first time around,  it has been much more tolerable this time so far.

column2: feelin better, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: in my 8th month and have been negative since 2nd month  lots of side effects first 2 months then very anemic for a few  read everything you can to know what ?s to ask drs..  on pegatron and ribashere combo  take at nite  I used immodium tylenol lots of water and rested as needed take as much care as can regarding I found the BE in Charge program from drug manufacture very helpful for information and advice have felt better since treated for anemia   trying to have positive outlook has helped me alot personally in beginning i was terrified by so many negative reviews on various sites  in some ways the treatment becomes easier after first few months

column2: diehard, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months
column9: bad headaches nauesa irritated scalp.it cleared hep c from blood tests. it's been 7 years but i'm still sick and tired every day

column2: princessbing, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Caregiver)
column9: My Father had renal cell carcinoma, had his kidney removed and this was the only treatment available for him as he only had 6 months to live and was a stage 4.  He took the medication for 7 months and has been cancer free for 13 years!  He is now 67 years old and living a normal life and back to work as a police officer.  This medication was truly a miracle drug for him and he sees his doctors every six months for his check ups and the doctors cannot find any cancer.  Thank you for this wonderful medication.

column9: It worked on me,however, I was pretty sick most of the time.  I beleive I got every side effect possible...thrush, headaches, earaches, tired, no appitite, weight loss, iching, female problems.....and more.  It was hell, but worth it in the end.  I have been HEP free for 6 years now.

column2: rakhshi, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I am suffering from chronic Hep C (3a),and have been on Interferon for the last 8 months, and now have to switch to Pegasys. This injection has not cured my conditions at all.

it is hard to tell if the medication is actually injecting or not, the window still shows fluid in the pen after use. We are not being able to tell if the medicine is going out of the pen except by pulling it out to see if it is dripping, and re-injecting it if it is!
